1598330.name: Magical Otoge Iris Development Art Book
1598330.description:
This is the art book/development record to Magical Otoge Iris. The book is full of spoilers, so please read it only after beating the entire game!
To access: In Steam, go to your Library > Right click on Magical Otoge Iris > Select Properties > Click on Local Files > Browse Local Files.

✦ ~65 pages/spreads
✦ Profiles, concept art, extra sketches, and my thoughts on the characters
✦ Contains a coupon code for a possible hard copy in the future, so you won't lose anything by getting this PDF
